pokemons.name: bulbasaur
pokemons.description: Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun's rays, the seed grows progressively larger.

pokemons.name: ivysaur
pokemons.description: There is a bud on this Pokémon's back. To support its weight, Ivysaur's legs and trunk grow thick and strong. If it starts spending more time lying in the sunlight, it's a sign that the bud will bloom into a large flower soon.

pokemons.name: venusaur
pokemons.description: There is a large flower on Venusaur's back. The flower is saidto take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flower's aroma soothes the emotions of people.

pokemons.name: charmander
pokemons.description: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

pokemons.name: charmeleon
pokemons.description: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.

pokemons.name: charizard
pokemons.description: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.

pokemons.name: squirtle
pokemons.description: Squirtle's shell is not merely used for protection. The shell's rounded shape and the grooves on its surfacehelp minimize resistance in water, enabling this Pokémonto swim at high speeds

pokemons.name: wartortle
pokemons.description: Its tail is large and covered with a rich, thick fur. The tailbecomes increasingly deeper in color as Wartortle ages. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this Pokémon'stoughness as a battler.

pokemons.name: blastoise
pokemons.description: Blastoise has water spouts that protrude from its shell. The water spouts are very accurate. They can shoot bullets ofwater with enough accuracy to strike empty cans from adistance of over 160 feet.

pokemons.name: caterpie
pokemons.description: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.

pokemons.name: metapod
pokemons.description: It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.

pokemons.name: butterfree
pokemons.description: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

pokemons.name: weedle
pokemons.description: Weedle has an extremely acute sense of smell. It is capable ofdistinguishing its favorite kinds of leaves from those it dislikesjust by sniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).

pokemons.name: kakuna
pokemons.description: Kakuna remains virtually immobile as it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it is extremely busy as it prepares forits coming evolution. This is evident from how hot the shellbecomes to the touch.

pokemons.name: beedrill
pokemons.description: Beedrill is extremely territorial. No one should ever approachits nest—this is for their own safety. If angered, they will attackin a furious swarm.

pokemons.name: pidgey
pokemons.description: Pidgey has an extremely sharp sense of direction. It is capableof unerringly returning home to its nest, however far it may beremoved from its familiar surroundings.

pokemons.name: pidgeotto
pokemons.description: Pidgeotto claims a large area as its own territory. This Pokémon flies around, patrolling its living space. If its territory is violated, it shows no mercy in thoroughlypunishing the foe with its sharp claws.

pokemons.name: pidgeot
pokemons.description: This Pokémon has a dazzling plumage of beautifullyglossy feathers. Many Trainers are captivated by thestriking beauty of the feathers on its head, compellingthem to choose Pidgeot as their Pokémon.

pokemons.name: rattata
pokemons.description: Its incisors grow continuously throughout its life. If its incisors get too long, this Pokémon becomes unable to eat, and it starves to death.

pokemons.name: raticate
pokemons.description: People say that it fled from its enemies by using its small webbed hind feet to swim from island to island in Alola.

pokemons.name: spearow
pokemons.description: Its reckless nature leads it to stand up to others—even large Pokémon—if it has to protect its territory.

pokemons.name: fearow
pokemons.description: Carrying food through Fearow's territory is dangerous. It will snatch the food away from you in a flash!

pokemons.name: ekans
pokemons.description: By dislocating its jaw, it can swallow prey larger than itself. After a meal, it curls up and rests.

pokemons.name: arbok
pokemons.description: The latest research has determined that there are over 20 possible arrangements of the patterns on its stomach.

pokemons.name: pikachu
pokemons.description: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.

pokemons.name: raichu
pokemons.description: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.

pokemons.name: sandshrew
pokemons.description: It lives in areas of limited rainfall. When danger approaches, it curls up into a ball to protect its soft stomach.

pokemons.name: sandslash
pokemons.description: Its claws and horns often break off. The broken claws and horns can be used to carve plows for tilling farm fields.

pokemons.name: nidoran-f
pokemons.description: Nidoran ♀ has barbs that secrete a powerful poison. They are thought to have developed as protection forthis small-bodied Pokémon. When enraged, it releasesa horrible toxin from its horn

pokemons.name: nidorina
pokemons.description: When Nidorina are with their friends or family, they keep theirbarbs tucked away to prevent hurting each other. This Pokémon appears to become nervous if separated fromthe others.

pokemons.name: nidoqueen
pokemons.description: Nidoqueen's body is encased in extremely hard scales. It is adept at sending foes flying with harsh tackles. This Pokémon is at its strongest when it is defending its young.

pokemons.name: nidoran-m
pokemons.description: Nidoran♂ has developed muscles for moving its ears. Thanksto them, the ears can be freely moved in any direction. Eventhe slightest sound does not escape this Pokémon's notice.

pokemons.name: nidorino
pokemons.description: Nidorino has a horn that is harder than a diamond. If it sensesa hostile presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once, and it challenges the foe with all its might.

pokemons.name: nidoking
pokemons.description: Nidoking's thick tail packs enormously destructive power. With one swing, it can topple a metal transmission tower. Once this Pokémon goes on a rampage, there is no stopping it.

pokemons.name: clefairy
pokemons.description: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.

pokemons.name: clefable
pokemons.description: A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen, it will run and hide the moment it senses people

pokemons.name: vulpix
pokemons.description: While young, it has six gorgeous tails. When it grows, several new tails are sprouted.

pokemons.name: ninetales
pokemons.description: It is said to live 1,000 years, and each of its tails is loaded with supernatural powers

pokemons.name: jigglypuff
pokemons.description: When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

pokemons.name: wigglytuff
pokemons.description: It has a very fine fur. Take care not to make it angry, or it may inflate steadily and hit with a body slam.

pokemons.name: zubat
pokemons.description: It has no eyeballs, so it can't see. It checks its surroundings via the ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.

pokemons.name: golbat
pokemons.description: Every once in a while, you'll see a Golbat that's missing some fangs. This happens when hunger drives it to try biting a Steel-type Pokémon.

pokemons.name: oddish
pokemons.description: If exposed to moonlight, it starts to move. It roams far and wide at night to scatter its seeds.

pokemons.name: gloom
pokemons.description: Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor. The horrid stench can cause fainting at a distance of 1.25 miles.

pokemons.name: vileplume
pokemons.description: It has the world’s largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

pokemons.name: paras
pokemons.description: Whether it's due to a lack of moisture or a lack of nutrients, in Alola the mushrooms on Paras don't grow up quite right.

pokemons.name: parasect
pokemons.description: The bug is mostly dead, with the mushroom on its back having become the main body. If the mushroom comes off, the bug stops moving.

pokemons.name: venonat
pokemons.description: Poison oozes from all over its body. It catches small bug Pokémon at night that are attracted by light.

pokemons.name: venomoth
pokemons.description: The wings are covered with dustlike scales. Every time it flaps its wings, it looses highly toxic dust.

pokemons.name: diglett
pokemons.description: It lives about one yard underground, where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears aboveground.

pokemons.name: dugtrio
pokemons.description: Its three heads bob separately up and down to loosen the soil nearby, making it easier for it to burrow.

pokemons.name: meowth
pokemons.description: All it does is sleep during the daytime. At night, it patrols its territory with its eyes aglow.

pokemons.name: persian
pokemons.description: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.

pokemons.name: psyduck
pokemons.description: It is constantly wracked by a headache. When the headache turns intense, it begins using mysterious powers.

pokemons.name: golduck
pokemons.description: When it swims at full speed using its long, webbed limbs, its forehead somehow begins to glow

pokemons.name: mankey
pokemons.description: It lives in groups in the treetops. If it loses sight of its group, it becomes infuriated by its loneliness.

pokemons.name: primeape
pokemons.description: It becomes wildly furious if it even senses someone looking at it. It chases anyone that meets its glare.

pokemons.name: growlithe
pokemons.description: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.

pokemons.name: arcanine
pokemons.description: An ancient picture scroll shows that people were captivated by its movement as it ran through prairies.

pokemons.name: poliwag
pokemons.description: Despite the danger, it wants to come up on land. So it does its best to waddle along, but when an enemy finds it, it rushes back to the water.

pokemons.name: poliwhirl
pokemons.description: Although it has become capable of living on land, it spends its time in the water, where its prey, fish Pokémon, are plentiful.

pokemons.name: poliwrath
pokemons.description: It's quite a gifted swimmer, even among Water-type Pokémon, but it normally spends its time on land.

pokemons.name: abra
pokemons.description: It uses various psychic powers even while it's sleeping, so you can't tell whether or not it's awake

pokemons.name: kadabra
pokemons.description: It stares at a silver spoon to amplify its psychic powers before it lets loose. Apparently, gold spoons are no good.

pokemons.name: alakazam
pokemons.description: Alakazam uses its psychic powers to make the spoons it carries. Each spoon is an original that there's only one of in the whole world.

pokemons.name: machop
pokemons.description: Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though it’s the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups.

pokemons.name: machoke
pokemons.description: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

pokemons.name: machamp
pokemons.description: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.

pokemons.name: bellsprout
pokemons.description: Bellsprout's thin and flexible body lets it bend and sway toavoid any attack, however strong it may be. From its mouth, this Pokémon spits a corrosive fluid that melts even iron.

pokemons.name: weepinbell
pokemons.description: Weepinbell has a large hook on its rear end. At night, thePokémon hooks on to a tree branch and goes to sleep. If it moves around in its sleep, it may wake up to find itselfon the ground.

pokemons.name: victreebel
pokemons.description: Victreebel has a long vine that extends from its head. This vine is waved and flicked about as if it were an animal toattract prey. When an unsuspecting prey draws near, thisPokémon swallows it whole.

pokemons.name: tentacool
pokemons.description: It drifts through the sea searching for prey. Its poisonous tentacles break off sometimes, but after a while, they grow back.

pokemons.name: tentacruel
pokemons.description: It fires off ultrasonic waves from its red orbs to weaken its prey, and then it wraps them up in its 80 tentacles.

pokemons.name: geodude
pokemons.description: Geodude that have lived a long life have had all their edges smoothed out until they're totally round. They also have a calm, quiet disposition.

pokemons.name: graveler
pokemons.description: It climbs up cliffs as it heads toward the peak of a mountain. As soon as it reaches the summit, it rolls back down the way it came.

pokemons.name: golem
pokemons.description: When Golem grow old, they stop shedding their shells. Those that have lived a long, long time have shells green with moss.

pokemons.name: ponyta
pokemons.description: It can’t run properly when it’s newly born. As it races around with others of its kind, its legs grow stronger.

pokemons.name: rapidash
pokemons.description: This Pokémon can be seen galloping through fields at speeds of up to 150 mph, its fiery mane fluttering in the wind.

pokemons.name: slowpoke
pokemons.description: It is incredibly slow and dopey. It takes five seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.

pokemons.name: slowbro
pokemons.description: When a Slowpoke went hunting in the sea, its tail was bitten by a Shellder. That made it evolve into Slowbro.

pokemons.name: magnemite
pokemons.description: The electromagnetic waves emitted by the units at the sides of its head expel antigravity, which allows it to float.

pokemons.name: magneton
pokemons.description: Three Magnemite are linked by a strong magnetic force. Earaches will occur if you get too close.

pokemons.name: farfetchd
pokemons.description: The stalk this Pokémon carries in its wings serves as a sword to cut down opponents. In a dire situation, the stalk can also serve as food.

pokemons.name: doduo
pokemons.description: Doduo's two heads never sleep at the same time. Its twoheads take turns sleeping, so one head can always keepwatch for enemies while the other one sleeps.

pokemons.name: dodrio
pokemons.description: Watch out if Dodrio's three heads are looking in three separatedirections. It's a sure sign that it is on its guard. Don't go nearthis Pokémon if it's being wary—it may decide to peck you.

pokemons.name: seel
pokemons.description: It has always been supposed that Seel live only in cold seas. Their having shown up in Alola is a mystery.

pokemons.name: dewgong
pokemons.description: It swims through the ocean at a speed of eight knots, searching for Pokémon that will become its prey. It's especially fond of Wishiwashi.

pokemons.name: grimer
pokemons.description: Born from sludge, these Pokémon now gather in polluted places and increase the bacteria in their bodies.

pokemons.name: muk
pokemons.description: It’s thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.

pokemons.name: shellder
pokemons.description: It is encased in a shell that is harder than diamond. Inside, however, it is surprisingly tender.

pokemons.name: cloyster
pokemons.description: Cloyster that live in seas with harsh tidal currents grow large, sharp spikes on their shells.

pokemons.name: gastly
pokemons.description: It wraps its opponent in its gas-like body, slowly weakening its prey by poisoning it through the skin.

pokemons.name: haunter
pokemons.description: It likes to lurk in the dark and tap shoulders with a gaseous hand. Its touch causes endless shuddering.

pokemons.name: gengar
pokemons.description: To steal the life of its target, it slips into the prey’s shadow and silently waits for an opportunity.

pokemons.name: onix
pokemons.description: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.

pokemons.name: drowzee
pokemons.description: It remembers every dream it eats. It rarely eats the dreams of adults because children’s are much tastier.

pokemons.name: hypno
pokemons.description: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of psi moves, such as Hypnosis and Confusion.

pokemons.name: krabby
pokemons.description: It can be found near the sea. The large pincers grow back if they are torn out of their sockets.

pokemons.name: kingler
pokemons.description: Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move.

pokemons.name: voltorb
pokemons.description: It rolls to move. If the ground is uneven, a sudden jolt from hitting a bump can cause it to explode.

pokemons.name: electrode
pokemons.description: The more energy it charges up, the faster it gets. But this also makes it more likely to explode.

pokemons.name: exeggcute
pokemons.description: Six of them form a single Pokémon. Should one of the six be lost, the next morning there will once more be six.

pokemons.name: exeggutor
pokemons.description: It engages its enemies using psychic powers. Each of its three heads fires off psychokinetic energy, tripling its power.

pokemons.name: cubone
pokemons.description: At night, it weeps loudly for its dead mother, but those cries only attract its natural enemy—Mandibuzz.

pokemons.name: marowak
pokemons.description: It throws bones at Mandibuzz to knock it down. It's thought that Marowak is trying to avenge its parent.

pokemons.name: hitmonlee
pokemons.description: This amazing Pokémon has an awesome sense of balance. It can kick in succession from any position.

pokemons.name: hitmonchan
pokemons.description: Its punches slice the air. They are launched at such high speed, even a slight graze could cause a burn.

pokemons.name: lickitung
pokemons.description: It checks out whatever's around it by licking everything. If you don't clean off a spot where it's licked you, you'll break out in a rash!

pokemons.name: koffing
pokemons.description: Its body is full of poisonous gas. It floats into garbage dumps, seeking out the fumes of raw, rotting trash.

pokemons.name: weezing
pokemons.description: It mixes gases between its two bodies. It’s said that these Pokémon were seen all over the Galar region back in the day.

pokemons.name: rhyhorn
pokemons.description: Strong, but not too bright, this Pokémon can shatter even a skyscraper with its charging tackles.

pokemons.name: rhydon
pokemons.description: It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution. It can punch holes through boulders with its horn

pokemons.name: chansey
pokemons.description: This kindly Pokémon lays highly nutritious eggs and shares them with injured Pokémon or people.

pokemons.name: tangela
pokemons.description: Tangela's vines snap off easily if they are grabbed. This happens without pain, allowing it to make a quickgetaway. The lost vines are replaced by newly grown vines thevery next day.

pokemons.name: kangaskhan
pokemons.description: Kangaskhan protects its child by keeping it in its pouch. It has zero forgiveness for those who harm its child and will beat them down.

pokemons.name: horsea
pokemons.description: Horsea eats small insects and moss off of rocks. If the oceancurrent turns fast, this Pokémon anchors itself by wrapping itstail around rocks or coral to prevent being washed away.

pokemons.name: seadra
pokemons.description: Seadra sleeps after wriggling itself between the branches ofcoral. Those trying to harvest coral are occasionally stung bythis Pokémon's poison barbs if they fail to notice it

pokemons.name: goldeen
pokemons.description: Its dorsal, pectoral, and tail fins wave elegantly in water. That is why it is known as the Water Dancer.

pokemons.name: seaking
pokemons.description: In autumn, its body becomes more fatty in preparing to propose to a mate. It takes on beautiful colors.

pokemons.name: staryu
pokemons.description: In many places, there are folktales of stardust falling into the ocean and becoming Staryu.

pokemons.name: starmie
pokemons.description: Its sparkling core is called the gem of the sea. This core can be made into high-priced accessories that are traded in secret.

pokemons.name: mr-mime
pokemons.description: The broadness of its hands may be no coincidence—many scientists believe its palms became enlarged specifically for pantomiming.

pokemons.name: scyther
pokemons.description: It slashes through grass with its sharp scythes, moving too fast for the human eye to track.

pokemons.name: jynx
pokemons.description: It sways its hips to a rhythm all its own. The precise movements of Jynx living in Alola are truly wonderful.

pokemons.name: electabuzz
pokemons.description: Electricity permeates its body. It swings its arms round and round to charge up electricity before unleashing a punch

pokemons.name: magmar
pokemons.description: Its entire body is burning. When it breathes, the temperature rises. When it sneezes, flames shoot out!

pokemons.name: pinsir
pokemons.description: It gets into territorial disputes with Vikavolt. For some reason, it apparently gets along well with Heracross in Alola.

pokemons.name: tauros
pokemons.description: When it targets an enemy, it charges furiously while whipping its body with its long tails.

pokemons.name: magikarp
pokemons.description: An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It may jump high on rare occasions but never more than seven feet.

pokemons.name: gyarados
pokemons.description: Once it appears, it goes on a rampage. It remains enraged until it demolishes everything around it.

pokemons.name: lapras
pokemons.description: A smart and kindhearted Pokémon, it glides across the surface of the sea while its beautiful song echoes around it.

pokemons.name: ditto
pokemons.description: Its transformation ability is perfect. However, if made to laugh, it can’t maintain its disguise

pokemons.name: eevee
pokemons.description: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

pokemons.name: vaporeon
pokemons.description: It lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin, which is often mistaken for a mermaid’s.

pokemons.name: jolteon
pokemons.description: It concentrates the weak electric charges emitted by its cells and launches wicked lightning bolts.

pokemons.name: flareon
pokemons.description: Inhaled air is carried to its flame sac, heated, and exhaled as fire that reaches over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokemons.name: porygon
pokemons.description: This Pokémon was created using the cutting-edge science of 20 years ago, so many parts of it have since become obsolete.

pokemons.name: omanyte
pokemons.description: Omanyte lived in the seas of antiquity. Its fossils have been found bearing bite marks from Archeops, so apparently Archeops preyed on it.

pokemons.name: omastar
pokemons.description: Its heavy shell is thought to be the reason this ancient Pokémon died out. It's apparently a distant ancestor of Octillery.

pokemons.name: kabuto
pokemons.description: This Pokémon thrived 300 million years ago. It's said that living specimens can still be seen in a certain region—a rare sight.

pokemons.name: kabutops
pokemons.description: Its body had begun to change so it could function on land. But it didn't adapt in time and went extinct.

pokemons.name: aerodactyl
pokemons.description: Restored from DNA found in amber, this Pokémon exhibited ferocity that was greater than expected. Some casualties resulted.

pokemons.name: snorlax
pokemons.description: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.

pokemons.name: articuno
pokemons.description: Articuno is a legendary bird Pokémon that can control ice. The flapping of its wings chills the air. As a result, it is saidthat when this Pokémon flies, snow will fall.

pokemons.name: zapdos
pokemons.description: Zapdos is a legendary bird Pokémon that has the ability tocontrol electricity. It usually lives in thunderclouds. The Pokémon gains power if it is stricken by lightning bolts.

pokemons.name: moltres
pokemons.description: Moltres is a legendary bird Pokémon that has the ability tocontrol fire. If this Pokémon is injured, it is said to dip its bodyin the molten magma of a volcano to burn and heal itself.

pokemons.name: dratini
pokemons.description: It sheds many layers of skin as it grows larger. During this process, it is protected by a rapid waterfall.

pokemons.name: dragonair
pokemons.description: They say that if it emits an aura from its whole body, the weather will begin to change instantly.

pokemons.name: dragonite
pokemons.description: It is said that somewhere in the ocean lies an island where these gather. Only they live there.

pokemons.name: mewtwo
pokemons.description: Mewtwo is a Pokémon that was created by geneticmanipulation. However, even though the scientific power ofhumans created this Pokémon's body, they failed to endowMewtwo with a compassionate heart.

pokemons.name: mew
pokemons.description: Mew is said to possess the genetic composition of all Pokémon. It is capable of making itself invisible at will, so it entirely avoids notice even if it approaches people.

pokemons.name: chikorita
pokemons.description: In battle, Chikorita waves its leaf around to keep the foe atbay. However, a sweet fragrance also wafts from the leaf, becalming the battling Pokémon and creating a cozy, friendlyatmosphere all around.

pokemons.name: bayleef
pokemons.description: Bayleef's neck is ringed by curled-up leaves. Inside eachtubular leaf is a small shoot of a tree. The fragrance of thisshoot makes people peppy.

pokemons.name: meganium
pokemons.description: The fragrance of Meganium's flower soothes and calmsemotions. In battle, this Pokémon gives off more of itsbecalming scent to blunt the foe's fighting spirit.

pokemons.name: cyndaquil
pokemons.description: Cyndaquil protects itself by flaring up the flames on its back. The flames are vigorous if the Pokémon is angry. However, if itis tired, the flames splutter fitfully with incomplete combustion.

pokemons.name: quilava
pokemons.description: Quilava keeps its foes at bay with the intensity of its flames andgusts of superheated air. This Pokémon applies its outstandingnimbleness to dodge attacks even while scorching the foewith flames.

pokemons.name: typhlosion
pokemons.description: Typhlosion obscures itself behind a shimmering heat haze thatit creates using its intensely hot flames. This Pokémon createsblazing explosive blasts that burn everything to cinders.

pokemons.name: totodile
pokemons.description: Despite the smallness of its body, Totodile's jaws are verypowerful. While the Pokémon may think it is just playfullynipping, its bite has enough power to cause serious injury.

pokemons.name: croconaw
pokemons.description: Once Croconaw has clamped its jaws on its foe, it willabsolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs are forkedback like barbed fishhooks, they become impossible to removewhen they have sunk in.

pokemons.name: feraligatr
pokemons.description: Feraligatr intimidates its foes by opening its huge mouth. In battle, it will kick the ground hard with its thick and powerfulhind legs to charge at the foe at an incredible speed.

pokemons.name: sentret
pokemons.description: When Sentret sleeps, it does so while another stands guard. The sentry wakes the others at the first sign of danger. When this Pokémon becomes separated from its pack, it becomes incapable of sleep due to fear.

pokemons.name: furret
pokemons.description: Furret has a very slim build. When under attack, it can slicklysquirm through narrow spaces and get away. In spite of itsshort limbs, this Pokémon is very nimble and fleet.

pokemons.name: hoothoot
pokemons.description: It always stands on one foot. It changes feet so fast, the movement can rarely be seen

pokemons.name: noctowl
pokemons.description: Its eyes are specially developed to enable it to see clearly even in murky darkness and minimal light.

pokemons.name: ledyba
pokemons.description: This Pokémon is very sensitive to cold. In the warmth of Alola, it appears quite lively.

pokemons.name: ledian
pokemons.description: It's said that the patterns on its back are related to the stars in the night sky, but the details of that relationship remain unclear.

pokemons.name: spinarak
pokemons.description: With threads from its mouth, it fashions sturdy webs that won't break even if you set a rock on them.

pokemons.name: ariados
pokemons.description: Every night, it wanders around in search of prey, whose movements it restrains by spewing threads before it bites into them with its fangs.

pokemons.name: crobat
pokemons.description: Its fangs are so sharp, if it bites you in the dark and sucks your blood, you won't notice any pain or realize you've been bitten

pokemons.name: chinchou
pokemons.description: Its antennae, which evolved from a fin, have both positive and negative charges flowing through them.

pokemons.name: lanturn
pokemons.description: The light it emits is so bright that it can illuminate the sea’s surface from a depth of over three miles.

pokemons.name: pichu
pokemons.description: It is unskilled at storing electric power. Any kind of shock causes it to discharge energy spontaneously.

pokemons.name: cleffa
pokemons.description: According to local rumors, Cleffa are often seen in places where shooting stars have fallen.

pokemons.name: igglybuff
pokemons.description: Its body has a faintly sweet scent and is bouncy and soft. If it bounces even once, it cannot stop.

pokemons.name: togepi
pokemons.description: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.

pokemons.name: togetic
pokemons.description: They say that it will appear before kindhearted, caring people and shower them with happiness.

pokemons.name: natu
pokemons.description: It is extremely good at climbing tree trunks and likes to eat the new sprouts on the trees.

pokemons.name: xatu
pokemons.description: They say that it stays still and quiet because it is seeing both the past and future at the same time.

pokemons.name: mareep
pokemons.description: If static electricity builds in its body, its fleece doubles in volume. Touching it will shock you.

pokemons.name: flaaffy
pokemons.description: As a result of storing too much electricity, it developed patches where even downy wool won’t grow.

pokemons.name: ampharos
pokemons.description: The bright light on its tail can be seen far away. It has been treasured since ancient times as a beacon.

pokemons.name: bellossom
pokemons.description: Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances, its petals rub together and make a pleasant ringing sound.

pokemons.name: marill
pokemons.description: The fur on its body naturally repels water. It can stay dry even when it plays in the water.

pokemons.name: azumarill
pokemons.description: Its long ears are superb sensors. It can distinguish the movements of things in water and tell what they are.

pokemons.name: sudowoodo
pokemons.description: Although it always pretends to be a tree, its composition appears more similar to rock than to vegetation.

pokemons.name: politoed
pokemons.description: Although its cries sound like screams, a composer created a beautiful ballad that was influenced by the sounds.

pokemons.name: hoppip
pokemons.description: This Pokémon is blown across vast distances by the wind. It is unclear where the Hoppip of Paldea originally came from.

pokemons.name: skiploom
pokemons.description: Skiploom enthusiasts can apparently tell where a Skiploom was born by the scent drifting from the flower on the Pokémon’s head.

pokemons.name: jumpluff
pokemons.description: Jumpluff travels on seasonal winds. Once its cotton spores run out, its journey ends, as does its life.

pokemons.name: aipom
pokemons.description: As it did more and more with its tail, its hands became clumsy. It makes its nest high in the treetops.

pokemons.name: sunkern
pokemons.description: It suddenly falls out of the sky in the morning. Knowing it’s weak, it simply feeds until it evolves.

pokemons.name: sunflora
pokemons.description: In the daytime, it rushes about in a hectic manner, but it comes to a complete stop when the sun sets.

pokemons.name: yanma
pokemons.description: Yanma is capable of seeing 360 degrees without having tomove its eyes. It is a great flier that is adept at making suddenstops and turning midair. This Pokémon uses its flying ability toquickly chase down targeted prey.

pokemons.name: wooper
pokemons.description: This Pokémon lives in cold water. It will leave the water to search for food when it gets cold outside.

pokemons.name: quagsire
pokemons.description: It has an easygoing nature. It doesn’t care if it bumps its head on boats and boulders while swimming.

pokemons.name: espeon
pokemons.description: The tip of its forked tail quivers when it is predicting its opponent’s next move.

pokemons.name: umbreon
pokemons.description: When exposed to the moon’s aura, the rings on its body glow faintly and it gains a mysterious power.

pokemons.name: murkrow
pokemons.description: Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.

pokemons.name: slowking
pokemons.description: When its head was bitten, toxins entered Slowpoke’s head and unlocked an extraordinary power.

pokemons.name: misdreavus
pokemons.description: This Pokémon startles people in the middle of the night. It gathers fear as its energy.

pokemons.name: unown
pokemons.description: This Pokémon is shaped like ancient writing. It is a mystery asto which came first, the ancient writings or the various Unown. Research into this topic is ongoing but nothing is known.

pokemons.name: wobbuffet
pokemons.description: It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its body to pump up its counterstrike.

pokemons.name: girafarig
pokemons.description: Though very small, the brain in its tail is still considered an important organ because it emits powerful psychic energy.

pokemons.name: pineco
pokemons.description: It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. The additional weight doesn’t bother it.

pokemons.name: forretress
pokemons.description: It’s usually found hanging on to a fat tree trunk. It shoots out bits of its shell when it sees action

pokemons.name: dunsparce
pokemons.description: It creates mazes in dark locations. When spotted, it flees into the ground by digging with its tail.

pokemons.name: gligar
pokemons.description: Gligar glides through the air without a sound as if it weresliding. This Pokémon hangs on to the face of its foe usingits clawed hind legs and the large pincers on its forelegs, theninjects the prey with its poison barb.

pokemons.name: steelix
pokemons.description: It is said that if an Onix lives for over 100 years, its composition changes to become diamond-like.

pokemons.name: snubbull
pokemons.description: It grows close to others easily and is also easily spoiled. The disparity between its face and its actions makes many young people wild about it.

pokemons.name: granbull
pokemons.description: While it has powerful jaws, it doesn't care for disputes, so it rarely has a chance to display their might

pokemons.name: qwilfish
pokemons.description: Be cautious if this Pokémon starts sucking in water—it will soon attack by scattering the toxic spikes that grow all over its body.

pokemons.name: scizor
pokemons.description: This Pokémon’s pincers, which contain steel, can crush any hard object they get ahold of into bits.

pokemons.name: shuckle
pokemons.description: It stores berries inside its shell. To avoid attacks, it hides beneath rocks and remains completely still.

pokemons.name: heracross
pokemons.description: It loves sweet nectar. To keep all the nectar to itself, it hurls rivals away with its prized horn.

pokemons.name: sneasel
pokemons.description: This cunning Pokémon hides under the cover of darkness, waiting to attack its prey.

pokemons.name: teddiursa
pokemons.description: This Pokémon discreetly follows Combee to find their hive. It scoops up big dollops of honey in its palms to eat.

pokemons.name: ursaring
pokemons.description: It usually wears a hardened expression, but when it’s licking up honey—which it loves—the joy it feels will cause it to break into a wide grin.

pokemons.name: slugma
pokemons.description: Molten magma courses throughout Slugma's circulatorysystem. If this Pokémon is chilled, the magma cools andhardens. Its body turns brittle and chunks fall off, reducingits size.

pokemons.name: magcargo
pokemons.description: Magcargo's shell is actually its skin that hardened as a resultof cooling. Its shell is very brittle and fragile—just touching itcauses it to crumble apart. This Pokémon returns to its originalsize by dipping itself in magma.

pokemons.name: swinub
pokemons.description: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.

pokemons.name: piloswine
pokemons.description: If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on its back stand up straight. It is very sensitive to sound.

pokemons.name: corsola
pokemons.description: It will regrow any branches that break off its head. People keep particularly beautiful Corsola branches as charms to promote safe childbirth.

pokemons.name: remoraid
pokemons.description: The water they shoot from their mouths can hit moving prey from more than 300 feet away.

pokemons.name: octillery
pokemons.description: It has a tendency to want to be in holes. It prefers rock crags or pots and sprays ink from them before attacking.

pokemons.name: delibird
pokemons.description: It carries food all day long. There are tales about lost people who were saved by the food it had.

pokemons.name: mantine
pokemons.description: If it builds up enough speed swimming, it can jump out above the waves and glide for over 300 feet.

pokemons.name: skarmory
pokemons.description: The wing feathers it sheds can be processed and made into knives whose sharpness is recognized by the finest chefs.

pokemons.name: houndour
pokemons.description: It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It uses a variety of cries for communicating with others.

pokemons.name: houndoom
pokemons.description: If you are burned by the flames it shoots from its mouth, the pain will never go away.

pokemons.name: kingdra
pokemons.description: Kingdra lives at extreme ocean depths that are otherwiseuninhabited. It has long been believed that the yawning of thisPokémon creates spiraling ocean currents.

pokemons.name: phanpy
pokemons.description: This Pokémon lives and nests on a riverbank. After playing in the mud, it won’t be able to settle down unless it washes its body.

pokemons.name: donphan
pokemons.description: Donphan is covered in tough hide, so even being hit by a car won’t faze this Pokémon. However, it is extremely susceptible to rain.

pokemons.name: porygon2
pokemons.description: AI has been installed in it. It learns various things all on its own, but it even remembers things it doesn't need to know.

pokemons.name: stantler
pokemons.description: This Pokémon apparently used to live in much harsher environments, and thus it once had stronger psychic powers than it does now.

pokemons.name: smeargle
pokemons.description: The fluid of Smeargle's tail secretions changes in the intensity of its hue as the Pokémon's emotions change.

pokemons.name: tyrogue
pokemons.description: It is always bursting with energy. To make itself stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.

pokemons.name: hitmontop
pokemons.description: It launches kicks while spinning. If it spins at high speed, it may bore its way into the ground.

pokemons.name: smoochum
pokemons.description: When it examines things, before touching them with its hands, it makes lip contact and then diligently licks all the dirt off its lips.

pokemons.name: elekid
pokemons.description: When it hears the crash of thunder, Elekid's mood improves. It can be useful to record that sound and play it when Elekid's feeling down.

pokemons.name: magby
pokemons.description: When flames drip from its nose, that means it has a cold. Have it lie down for a nice rest in some magma.

pokemons.name: miltank
pokemons.description: It produces over five gallons of milk a day. The higher the quality of the pastures it lives in, the richer and tastier its milk becomes.

pokemons.name: blissey
pokemons.description: Anyone who takes even one taste of Blissey’s egg becomes unfailingly caring and pleasant to everyone.

pokemons.name: raikou
pokemons.description: Raikou embodies the speed of lightning. The roars of thisPokémon send shock waves shuddering through the airand shake the ground as if lightning bolts had comecrashing down.

pokemons.name: entei
pokemons.description: Entei embodies the passion of magma. This Pokémon isthought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano. It sends up massive bursts of fire that utterly consume all thatthey touch.

pokemons.name: suicune
pokemons.description: Suicune embodies the compassion of a pure spring of water. It runs across the land with gracefulness. This Pokémon hasthe power to purify dirty water.

pokemons.name: larvitar
pokemons.description: Born deep underground, this Pokémon becomes a pupa after eating enough dirt to make a mountain.

pokemons.name: pupitar
pokemons.description: This pupa flies around wildly by venting with great force the gas pressurized inside its body.

pokemons.name: lugia
pokemons.description: Lugia's wings pack devastating power—a light fluttering of itswings can blow apart regular houses. As a result, thisPokémon chooses to live out of sight deep under the sea.

pokemons.name: ho-oh
pokemons.description: Ho-Oh's feathers glow in seven colors depending on the angleat which they are struck by light. These feathers are said tobring happiness to the bearers. This Pokémon is said to live atthe foot of a rainbow.

pokemons.name: celebi
pokemons.description: This Pokémon came from the future by crossing over time. It is thought that so long as Celebi appears, a bright andshining future awaits us.

pokemons.name: treecko
pokemons.description: Treecko has small hooks on the bottom of its feet that enableit to scale vertical walls. This Pokémon attacks by slammingfoes with its thick tail.

pokemons.name: grovyle
pokemons.description: The leaves growing out of Grovyle's body are convenient forcamouflaging it from enemies in the forest. This Pokémon is amaster at climbing trees in jungles.

pokemons.name: sceptile
pokemons.description: The leaves growing on Sceptile's body are very sharp edged. This Pokémon is very agile—it leaps all over the branches oftrees and jumps on its foe from above or behind.

pokemons.name: torchic
pokemons.description: Torchic sticks with its Trainer, following behind withunsteady steps. This Pokémon breathes fire of over1,800 degrees Fahrenheit, including fireballs that leavethe foe scorched black.

pokemons.name: combusken
pokemons.description: Combusken toughens up its legs and thighs by runningthrough fields and mountains. This Pokémon's legs possessboth speed and power, enabling it to dole out 10 kicks inone second.

pokemons.name: blaziken
pokemons.description: In battle, Blaziken blows out intense flames from its wrists andattacks foes courageously. The stronger the foe, the moreintensely this Pokémon's wrists burn.

pokemons.name: mudkip
pokemons.description: The fin on Mudkip's head acts as highly sensitive radar. Using this fin to sense movements of water and air, thisPokémon can determine what is taking place around itwithout using its eyes.

pokemons.name: marshtomp
pokemons.description: The surface of Marshtomp's body is enveloped by a thin, stickyfilm that enables it to live on land. This Pokémon plays in mudon beaches when the ocean tide is low.

pokemons.name: swampert
pokemons.description: Swampert is very strong. It has enough power to easily drag aboulder weighing more than a ton. This Pokémon also haspowerful vision that lets it see even in murky wate

pokemons.name: poochyena
pokemons.description: At first sight, Poochyena takes a bite at anything that moves. This Pokémon chases after prey until the victim becomesexhausted. However, it may turn tail if the prey strikes back

pokemons.name: mightyena
pokemons.description: Mightyena gives obvious signals when it is preparing to attack. It starts to growl deeply and then flattens its body. This Pokémon will bite savagely with its sharply pointed fangs.

pokemons.name: zigzagoon
pokemons.description: It marks its territory by rubbing its bristly fur on trees. This variety of Zigzagoon is friendlier and calmer than the kind native to Galar.

pokemons.name: linoone
pokemons.description: Its fur is strong and supple. Shaving brushes made with shed Linoone hairs are highly prized.

pokemons.name: wurmple
pokemons.description: Using the spikes on its rear end, Wurmple peels the bark offtrees and feeds on the sap that oozes out. This Pokémon'sfeet are tipped with suction pads that allow it to cling to glasswithout slipping.

pokemons.name: silcoon
pokemons.description: Silcoon tethers itself to a tree branch using silk to keep fromfalling. There, this Pokémon hangs quietly while it awaitsevolution. It peers out of the silk cocoon through a small hole.

pokemons.name: beautifly
pokemons.description: Beautifly's favorite food is the sweet pollen of flowers. If youwant to see this Pokémon, just leave a potted flower by anopen window. Beautifly is sure to come looking for poll

pokemons.name: cascoon
pokemons.description: Cascoon makes its protective cocoon by wrapping its bodyentirely with a fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goesaround its body, it hardens. This Pokémon prepares for itsevolution inside the cocoon.

pokemons.name: dustox
pokemons.description: Dustox is instinctively drawn to light. Swarms of this Pokémonare attracted by the bright lights of cities, where they wreakhavoc by stripping the leaves off roadside trees for food.

pokemons.name: lotad
pokemons.description: It searches about for clean water. If it does not drink water for too long, the leaf on its head wilts.

pokemons.name: lombre
pokemons.description: It is nocturnal and becomes active at nightfall. It feeds on aquatic mosses that grow in the riverbed.

pokemons.name: ludicolo
pokemons.description: The rhythm of bright, festive music activates Ludicolo’s cells, making it more powerful

pokemons.name: seedot
pokemons.description: If it remains still, it looks just like a real nut. It delights in surprising foraging Pokémon

pokemons.name: shiftry
pokemons.description: A Pokémon that was feared as a forest guardian. It can read the foe’s mind and take preemptive action.

pokemons.name: taillow
pokemons.description: Taillow courageously stands its ground against foes, howeverstrong they may be. This gutsy Pokémon will remain defianteven after a loss. On the other hand, it cries loudly if itbecomes hungry.

pokemons.name: swellow
pokemons.description: Swellow flies high above our heads, making graceful arcsin the sky. This Pokémon dives at a steep angle as soon asit spots its prey. The hapless prey is tightly grasped bySwellow's clawed feet, preventing escape.

pokemons.name: wingull
pokemons.description: It soars high in the sky, riding on updrafts like a glider. It carries food tucked in its bill.

pokemons.name: pelipper
pokemons.description: It is a flying transporter that carries small Pokémon in its beak. It bobs on the waves to rest its wings.

pokemons.name: ralts
pokemons.description: The horns on its head provide a strong power that enables it to sense people’s emotions.

pokemons.name: kirlia
pokemons.description: It has a psychic power that enables it to distort the space around it and see into the future.

pokemons.name: gardevoir
pokemons.description: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.

pokemons.name: surskit
pokemons.description: They usually live on ponds, but after an evening shower, they may appear on puddles in towns.

pokemons.name: masquerain
pokemons.description: It flaps its four wings to hover and fly freely in any direction—to and fro and sideways.

pokemons.name: shroomish
pokemons.description: It prefers damp places. By day it remains still in the forest shade. It releases toxic powder from its head.

pokemons.name: breloom
pokemons.description: It scatters poisonous spores and throws powerful punches while its foe is hampered by inhaled spores.

pokemons.name: slakoth
pokemons.description: It sleeps for 20 hours every day. Making drowsy those that see it is one of its abilities.

pokemons.name: vigoroth
pokemons.description: Its stress level rises if it cannot keep moving constantly. Too much stress makes it feel sick.

pokemons.name: slaking
pokemons.description: It is the world’s most slothful Pokémon. However, it can exert horrifying power by releasing pent-up energy all at once.

pokemons.name: nincada
pokemons.description: Because it lived almost entirely underground, it is nearly blind. It uses its antennae instead.

pokemons.name: ninjask
pokemons.description: Its cry leaves a lasting headache if heard for too long. It moves so quickly that it is almost invisible.

pokemons.name: shedinja
pokemons.description: A most peculiar Pokémon that somehow appears in a Poké Ball when a Nincada evolves.

pokemons.name: whismur
pokemons.description: Normally, Whismur's voice is very quiet—it is barely audibleeven if one is paying close attention. However, if this Pokémonsenses danger, it starts crying at an earsplitting volume.

pokemons.name: loudred
pokemons.description: Loudred's bellowing can completely decimate a wood-framehouse. It uses its voice to punish its foes. This Pokémon'sround ears serve as loudspeakers

pokemons.name: exploud
pokemons.description: Exploud triggers earthquakes with the tremors it createsby bellowing. If this Pokémon violently inhales from theports on its body, it's a sign that it is preparing to let loosea huge bello

pokemons.name: makuhita
pokemons.description: It grows stronger by enduring harsh training. It is a gutsy Pokémon that can withstand any attack.

pokemons.name: hariyama
pokemons.description: It loves challenging others to tests of strength. It has the power to stop a train with a slap.

pokemons.name: azurill
pokemons.description: Its tail bounces like a rubber ball. It flings that tail around to fight opponents bigger than itself.

pokemons.name: nosepass
pokemons.description: It moves less than an inch a year, but when it's in a jam, it will spin and drill down into the ground in a split second.

pokemons.name: skitty
pokemons.description: Skitty has the habit of becoming fascinated by moving objectsand chasing them around. This Pokémon is known to chaseafter its own tail and become dizzy.

pokemons.name: delcatty
pokemons.description: Delcatty prefers to live an unfettered existence in which it cando as it pleases at its own pace. Because this Pokémon eatsand sleeps whenever it decides, its daily routines arecompletely random.

pokemons.name: sableye
pokemons.description: It dwells in the darkness of caves. It uses its sharp claws to dig up gems to nourish itself.

pokemons.name: mawile
pokemons.description: It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into complacency, then bites with its huge, relentless jaws.

pokemons.name: aron
pokemons.description: This Pokémon has a body of steel. To make its body, Aronfeeds on iron ore that it digs from mountains. Occasionally, it causes major trouble by eating bridges and rails.

pokemons.name: lairon
pokemons.description: Lairon tempers its steel body by drinking highly nutritiousmineral springwater until it is bloated. This Pokémon makes itsnest close to springs of delicious water.

pokemons.name: aggron
pokemons.description: Aggron claims an entire mountain as its own territory. It mercilessly beats up anything that violates its environment. This Pokémon vigilantly patrols its territory at all times.

pokemons.name: meditite
pokemons.description: It never skips its daily yoga training. It heightens its inner strength through meditation

pokemons.name: medicham
pokemons.description: Through yoga training, it gained the psychic power to predict its foe’s next move.

pokemons.name: electrike
pokemons.description: It stores static electricity in its fur for discharging. It gives off sparks if a storm approaches.

pokemons.name: manectric
pokemons.description: It stimulates its own muscles with electricity, so it can move quickly. It eases its soreness with electricity, too, so it can recover quickly as well.

pokemons.name: plusle
pokemons.description: Plusle always acts as a cheerleader for its partners. Whenever a teammate puts out a good effort in battle, thisPokémon shorts out its body to create the crackling noises ofsparks to show its joy.

pokemons.name: minun
pokemons.description: Minun is more concerned about cheering on its partners thanits own safety. It shorts out the electricity in its body to createbrilliant showers of sparks to cheer on its teammates.

pokemons.name: volbeat
pokemons.description: With the arrival of night, Volbeat emits light from its tail. It communicates with others by adjusting the intensity andflashing of its light. This Pokémon is attracted by the sweetaroma of Illumise.

pokemons.name: illumise
pokemons.description: Illumise attracts a swarm of Volbeat using a sweet fragrance. Once the Volbeat have gathered, this Pokémon leads thelit-up swarm in drawing geometric designs on the canvas ofthe night sky.

pokemons.name: roselia
pokemons.description: Its flowers give off a relaxing fragrance. The stronger its aroma, the healthier the Roselia is.

pokemons.name: gulpin
pokemons.description: There is nothing its stomach can’t digest. While it is digesting, vile, overpowering gases are expelled.

pokemons.name: swalot
pokemons.description: It gulps anything that fits in its mouth. Its special enzymes can dissolve anything.

pokemons.name: carvanha
pokemons.description: They're such cowards that they won't hunt alone. When five or so of them get together, they suddenly turn ferocious!

pokemons.name: sharpedo
pokemons.description: People believe that carrying one of its discarded fangs will prevent mishaps at sea, so the fangs are made into accessories.

pokemons.name: wailmer
pokemons.description: It shows off by spraying jets of seawater from the nostrils above its eyes. It eats a solid ton of Wishiwashi every day.

pokemons.name: wailord
pokemons.description: It can sometimes knock out opponents with the shock created by breaching and crashing its big body onto the water.

pokemons.name: numel
pokemons.description: Magma of almost 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit courses through its body. When it grows cold, the magma hardens and slows it.

pokemons.name: camerupt
pokemons.description: It lives in the crater of a volcano. It is well known that the humps on its back erupt every 10 years.

pokemons.name: torkoal
pokemons.description: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered

pokemons.name: spoink
pokemons.description: Spoink will die if it stops bouncing. The pearl on its head amplifies its psychic powers.

pokemons.name: grumpig
pokemons.description: It can perform odd dance steps to influence foes. Its style of dancing became hugely popular overseas.

pokemons.name: spinda
pokemons.description: Its steps are shaky and stumbling. Walking for a long time makes it feel sick.

pokemons.name: trapinch
pokemons.description: Its nest is a sloped, bowl-like pit in the desert. Once something has fallen in, there is no escape.

pokemons.name: vibrava
pokemons.description: The ultrasonic waves it generates by rubbing its two wings together cause severe headaches.

pokemons.name: flygon
pokemons.description: This Pokémon hides in the heart of sandstorms it creates and seldom appears where people can see it.

pokemons.name: cacnea
pokemons.description: It prefers harsh environments, such as deserts. It can survive for 30 days on water stored in its body.

pokemons.name: cacturne
pokemons.description: Packs of them follow travelers through the desert until the travelers can no longer move.

pokemons.name: swablu
pokemons.description: It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.

pokemons.name: altaria
pokemons.description: If it bonds with a person, it will gently envelop the friend with its soft wings, then hum

pokemons.name: zangoose
pokemons.description: It’s Seviper’s archrival. To threaten those it encounters, it fans out the claws on its front paws

pokemons.name: seviper
pokemons.description: It sharpens its swordlike tail on hard rocks. It hides in tall grass and strikes unwary prey with venomous fangs.

pokemons.name: lunatone
pokemons.description: The phase of the moon apparently has some effect on its power. It’s active on the night of a full moon.

pokemons.name: solrock
pokemons.description: When it rotates itself, it gives off light similar to the sun, thus blinding its foes.

pokemons.name: barboach
pokemons.description: Its two whiskers provide a sensitive radar. Even in muddy waters, it can detect its prey’s location.

pokemons.name: whiscash
pokemons.description: It is extremely protective of its territory. If any foe approaches, it attacks using vicious tremors.

pokemons.name: corphish
pokemons.description: No matter how dirty the water in the river, it will adapt and thrive. It has a strong will to survive.

pokemons.name: crawdaunt
pokemons.description: A rough customer that wildly flails its giant claws. It is said to be extremely hard to raise.

pokemons.name: baltoy
pokemons.description: It moves while spinning around on its single foot. Some Baltoy have been seen spinning on their heads.

pokemons.name: claydol
pokemons.description: This mysterious Pokémon started life as an ancient clay figurine made over 20,000 years ago.

pokemons.name: lileep
pokemons.description: In ancient times, it lived in warm seas. It disguised itself as seaweed to ambush its prey and devoured them whole when they got close.

pokemons.name: cradily
pokemons.description: Normally, it lived on shallow sea shoals. When the tide went out, this Pokémon came up on land to search for prey.

pokemons.name: anorith
pokemons.description: When restored Anorith are released into the ocean, they don't thrive, because the water composition has changed since their era.

pokemons.name: armaldo
pokemons.description: It lived on land and went out into the sea to hunt for prey. Its sharp claws were its greatest weapon.

pokemons.name: feebas
pokemons.description: Although unattractive and unpopular, this Pokémon’s marvelous vitality has made it a subject of research.

pokemons.name: milotic
pokemons.description: Milotic has provided inspiration to many artists. It has even been referred to as the most beautiful Pokémon of all

pokemons.name: castform
pokemons.description: Although its form changes with the weather, that is apparently the result of a chemical reaction and not the result of its own free will.

pokemons.name: kecleon
pokemons.description: It changes its hue to blend into its surroundings. If no one takes notice of it for too long, it will pout and never reveal itself.

pokemons.name: shuppet
pokemons.description: It loves to feed on feelings like envy and malice. Its upright horn catches the emotions of people

pokemons.name: banette
pokemons.description: This Pokémon developed from an abandoned doll that amassed a grudge. It is seen in dark alleys

pokemons.name: duskull
pokemons.description: If it finds bad children who won’t listen to their parents, it will spirit them away—or so it’s said.

pokemons.name: dusclops
pokemons.description: Its body is entirely hollow. When it opens its mouth, it sucks everything in as if it were a black hole.

pokemons.name: tropius
pokemons.description: It lives in tropical jungles. The bunch of fruit around its neck is delicious. The fruit grows twice a year.

pokemons.name: chimecho
pokemons.description: Chimecho makes its cries echo inside its hollow body. When this Pokémon becomes enraged, its cries result inultrasonic waves that have the power to knock foes flying.

pokemons.name: absol
pokemons.description: The only thing unlucky about Absol is its appearance. It protects fields and warns people of disaster, so one ought to be grateful for it.

pokemons.name: wynaut
pokemons.description: It tends to move in a pack. Individuals squash against one another to toughen their spirits.

pokemons.name: snorunt
pokemons.description: It is said that several Snorunt gather under giant leaves and live together in harmon

pokemons.name: glalie
pokemons.description: Its prey is instantaneously frozen stiff by the cold air it exhales from its huge mouth. While they’re in that frozen state, it gobbles them up.

pokemons.name: spheal
pokemons.description: Spheal is much faster rolling than walking to get around. When groups of this Pokémon eat, they all clap at once toshow their pleasure. Because of this, their mealtimes are noisy.

pokemons.name: sealeo
pokemons.description: Sealeo has the habit of always juggling on the tip of its noseanything it sees for the first time. This Pokémon occasionallyentertains itself by balancing and rolling a Spheal on its nose.

pokemons.name: walrein
pokemons.description: Walrein's two massively developed tusks can totally shatterblocks of ice weighing 10 tons with one blow. This Pokémon'sthick coat of blubber insulates it from subzero temperatures.

pokemons.name: clamperl
pokemons.description: Despite its appearance, it's carnivorous. It clamps down on its prey with both sides of its shell and doesn't let go until they stop moving.

pokemons.name: huntail
pokemons.description: It's not the strongest swimmer. It wags its tail to lure in its prey and then gulps them down as soon as they get close.

pokemons.name: gorebyss
pokemons.description: The color of its body changes with the water temperature. The coloration of Gorebyss in Alola is almost blindingly vivid.

pokemons.name: relicanth
pokemons.description: Thought to have gone extinct, Relicanth was given a name that is a variation of the name of the person who discovered it.

pokemons.name: luvdisc
pokemons.description: Its heart-shaped body makes it popular. In some places, you would give a Luvdisc to someone you love.

pokemons.name: bagon
pokemons.description: Its steel-hard head can shatter boulders. It longingly hopes for wings to grow so it can fly.

pokemons.name: shelgon
pokemons.description: The cells within its shell transform with explosive speed, preparing it for evolution.

pokemons.name: salamence
pokemons.description: It flies around on its wings, which have grown in at last. In its happiness, it gushes hot flames, burning up everything it passes over.

pokemons.name: beldum
pokemons.description: Instead of blood, magnetism flows through its body. When it's feeling bad, try giving it a magnet

pokemons.name: metang
pokemons.description: With its two brains, it fires powerful psychic energy to stop its prey in their tracks.

pokemons.name: metagross
pokemons.description: It boasts not only psychic powers but also fantastic strength. It grabs its prey with its four legs and holds them in place with its cla

pokemons.name: regirock
pokemons.description: Regirock was sealed away by people long ago. If thisPokémon's body is damaged in battle, it is said to seekout suitable rocks on its own to repair itself.

pokemons.name: regice
pokemons.description: Regice's body was made during an ice age. The deep-frozenbody can't be melted, even by fire. This Pokémon controlsfrigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokemons.name: registeel
pokemons.description: Registeel has a body that is harder than any kind of metal. Its body is apparently hollow. No one has any idea what thisPokémon eats.

pokemons.name: latias
pokemons.description: Latias is highly sensitive to the emotions of people. If it sensesany hostility, this Pokémon ruffles the feathers all over its bodyand cries shrilly to intimidate the foe.

pokemons.name: latios
pokemons.description: Latios has the ability to make others see an image of what ithas seen or imagines in its head. This Pokémon is intelligentand understands human speech.

pokemons.name: kyogre
pokemons.description: Through Primal Reversion and with nature'sfull power, it will take back its true form. It cansummon storms that cause the sea levels to ris

pokemons.name: groudon
pokemons.description: Groudon is said to be the personification of the landitself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Kyogre, as each sought to gain the power of nature.

pokemons.name: rayquaza
pokemons.description: Rayquaza is said to have lived for hundreds of millionsof years. Legends remain of how it put to restthe clash between Kyogre and Groudon.

pokemons.name: jirachi
pokemons.description: A legend states that Jirachi will make true any wish that iswritten on notes attached to its head when it awakens. If thisPokémon senses danger, it will fight without awakening.

pokemons.name: deoxys-normal
pokemons.description: The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation uponexposure to a laser beam and resulted in Deoxys. The crystalline organ on this Pokémon's chest appears to beits brain.

pokemons.name: turtwig
pokemons.description: Photosynthesis occurs across its body under thesun. The shell on its back is actually hardened soil.

pokemons.name: grotle
pokemons.description: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.

pokemons.name: torterra
pokemons.description: Ancient people imagined that beneath the ground, a gigantic Torterra dwelled.

pokemons.name: chimchar
pokemons.description: Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made in its belly. Even rain can't extinguish the fire.

pokemons.name: monferno
pokemons.description: It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on itstail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.

pokemons.name: infernape
pokemons.description: Its crown of fire is indicative of its fiery nature. It is beaten by none in terms of quickness.

pokemons.name: piplup
pokemons.description: It doesn't like to be taken care of. It's difficult tobond with since it won't listen to its Trainer.

pokemons.name: prinplup
pokemons.description: It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, everyone of them believes it is the most important.

pokemons.name: empoleon
pokemons.description: It swims as fast as a jet boat. The edges of itswings are sharp and can slice apart drifting ice.

pokemons.name: starly
pokemons.description: They flock around mountains and fields, chasing after bug Pokémon. Their singing is noisy and annoying.

pokemons.name: staravia
pokemons.description: Recognizing their own weakness, they always live in a group. When alone, a Staravia cries noisily

pokemons.name: staraptor
pokemons.description: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.

pokemons.name: bidoof
pokemons.description: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It ismore agile and active than it appears.

pokemons.name: bibarel
pokemons.description: It busily makes its nest with stacks of branches androots it has cut up with its sharp incisors.

pokemons.name: kricketot
pokemons.description: Its legs are short. Whenever it stumbles, its stiff antennae clack with a xylophone-like sound.

pokemons.name: kricketune
pokemons.description: By allowing its cry to resonate in the hollow of its belly, it produces a captivating sound.

pokemons.name: shinx
pokemons.description: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.

pokemons.name: luxio
pokemons.description: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.

pokemons.name: luxray
pokemons.description: It can see clearly through walls to track down its prey and seek its lost young.

pokemons.name: budew
pokemons.description: The pollen it releases contains poison. If this Pokémon is raised on clean water, the poison’s toxicity is increased.

pokemons.name: roserade
pokemons.description: After captivating opponents with its sweet scent, it lashes them with its thorny whips.

pokemons.name: cranidos
pokemons.description: A primeval Pokémon, it possesses a hard and sturdy skull, lacking any intelligence within.

pokemons.name: rampardos
pokemons.description: In ancient times, people would dig up fossils of this Pokémon and use its skull, which is harder than steel, to make helmets.

pokemons.name: shieldon
pokemons.description: A mild-mannered, herbivorous Pokémon, it used its face to dig up tree roots to eat. The skin on its face was plenty tough.

pokemons.name: bastiodon
pokemons.description: The bones of its face are huge and hard, so they were mistaken for its spine until after this Pokémon was successfully restored.

pokemons.name: burmy
pokemons.description: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it coversitself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

pokemons.name: wormadam-plant
pokemons.description: Its appearance changes depending on where itevolved. The materials on hand become a part ofits body.

pokemons.name: mothim
pokemons.description: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honeycollected by Combee

pokemons.name: combee
pokemons.description: At night, Combee sleep in a group of about a hundred, packed closely together in a lump.

pokemons.name: vespiquen
pokemons.description: It houses its colony in cells in its body and releases various pheromones to make those grubs do its bidding.

pokemons.name: pachirisu
pokemons.description: It’s one of the kinds of Pokémon with electric cheek pouches. It shoots charges from its tail.

pokemons.name: buizel
pokemons.description: It spins its two tails like a screw to propel itself through water. The tails also slice clinging seaweed.

pokemons.name: floatzel
pokemons.description: With its flotation sac inflated, it can carry people on its back. It deflates the sac before it dives.

pokemons.name: cherubi
pokemons.description: It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting pecked by bird Pokémon that would love to make off with its small, nutrient-rich storage ball

pokemons.name: cherrim
pokemons.description: As a bud, it barely moves. It sits still, placidly waiting for sunlight to appear.

pokemons.name: shellos
pokemons.description: It used to have a shell on its back long ago. This species is closely related to Pokémon like Shellder.

pokemons.name: gastrodon
pokemons.description: Its whole body is sticky with mucus. In the past, this form of Gastrodon was by far the more numerous one.

pokemons.name: ambipom
pokemons.description: In their search for comfortable trees, they get into territorial disputes with groups of Passimian. They win about half the time.

pokemons.name: drifloon
pokemons.description: It is whispered that any child who mistakes Drifloon for a balloon and holds on to it could wind up missing.

pokemons.name: drifblim
pokemons.description: It can generate and release gas within its body. That’s how it can control the altitude of its drift.

pokemons.name: buneary
pokemons.description: Its arms and legs are weak, but when it rolls its ears up tight and then unleashes them with its full force, it can smash boulders to dust.

pokemons.name: lopunny
pokemons.description: Lopunny regrows its coat twice a year. Mufflers and hats made from its fur are really warm.

pokemons.name: mismagius
pokemons.description: Its cry sounds like an incantation. It is said the cry may rarely be imbued with happiness-giving power.

pokemons.name: honchkrow
pokemons.description: It is merciless by nature. It is said that it never forgives the mistakes of its Murkrow followers.

pokemons.name: glameow
pokemons.description: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.

pokemons.name: purugly
pokemons.description: It would claim another Pokémon's nest as its ownif it finds a nest sufficiently comfortable.

pokemons.name: chingling
pokemons.description: Each time it hops, it makes a ringing sound. It deafens foes by emitting high-frequency cries.

pokemons.name: stunky
pokemons.description: It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench spreads over a mile radius, driving Pokémon away.

pokemons.name: skuntank
pokemons.description: It attacks by spraying a horribly smelly fluid from the tip of its tail. Attacks from above confound it.

pokemons.name: bronzor
pokemons.description: Ancient people believed that the pattern on Bronzor’s back contained a mysterious power.

pokemons.name: bronzong
pokemons.description: In ages past, this Pokémon was revered as a bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.

pokemons.name: bonsly
pokemons.description: In order to adjust the level of fluids in its body, it exudes water from its eyes. This makes it appear to be crying.

pokemons.name: mime-jr
pokemons.description: It mimics everyone it sees, but it puts extra effort into copying the graceful dance steps of Mr. Rime as practice.

pokemons.name: happiny
pokemons.description: It carries a round, white rock in its belly pouch. If it gets along well with someone, it will sometimes give that person the rock.

pokemons.name: chatot
pokemons.description: It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to trick theminto thinking it's one of them. This way they won'tattack it.

pokemons.name: spiritomb
pokemons.description: Its constant mischief and misdeeds resulted in it being bound to an Odd Keystone by a mysterious spell.

pokemons.name: gible
pokemons.description: It skulks in caves, and when prey or an enemy passes by, it leaps out and chomps them. The force of its attack sometimes chips its teeth.

pokemons.name: gabite
pokemons.description: In rare cases, it molts and sheds its scales. Medicine containing its scales as an ingredient will make a weary body feel invigorated.

pokemons.name: garchomp
pokemons.description: It is said that when one runs at high speed, its wings create blades of wind that can fell nearby trees.

pokemons.name: munchlax
pokemons.description: Stuffing itself with vast amounts of food is its only concern. Whether the food is rotten or fresh, yummy or tasteless—it does not care.

pokemons.name: riolu
pokemons.description: They communicate with one another using their auras. They are able to run all through the night.

pokemons.name: lucario
pokemons.description: It’s said that no foe can remain invisible to Lucario, since it can detect auras—even those of foes it could not otherwise see.

pokemons.name: hippopotas
pokemons.description: It shuts its nostrils tight, then travels through sand as if walking. They form colonies of around 10.

pokemons.name: hippowdon
pokemons.description: It is surprisingly quick to anger. It holds its mouth agape as a display of its strength.

pokemons.name: skorupi
pokemons.description: After burrowing into the sand, it waits patiently for prey to come near. This Pokémon and Sizzlipede share common descent

pokemons.name: drapion
pokemons.description: Its poison is potent, but it rarely sees use. This Pokémon prefers to use physical force instead, going on rampages with its car-crushing strength.

pokemons.name: croagunk
pokemons.description: Inflating its poison sacs, it fills the area with an odd sound and hits flinching opponents with a poison jab.

pokemons.name: toxicroak
pokemons.description: Swaying and dodging the attacks of its foes, it weaves its flexible body in close, then lunges out with its poisonous claws.

pokemons.name: carnivine
pokemons.description: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, thenchomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.

pokemons.name: finneon
pokemons.description: The line running down its side can store sunlight. It shines vividly at night.

pokemons.name: lumineon
pokemons.description: With its shining light, it lures its prey close. However, the light also happens to attract ferocious fish Pokémon—its natural predators.

pokemons.name: mantyke
pokemons.description: Mantyke living in Galar seem to be somewhat sluggish. The colder waters of the seas in this region may be the cause.

pokemons.name: snover
pokemons.description: During cold seasons, it migrates to the mountain’s lower reaches. It returns to the snow-covered summit in the spring.

pokemons.name: abomasnow
pokemons.description: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.

pokemons.name: weavile
pokemons.description: Evolution made it even more devious. It communicates by clawing signs in boulders.

pokemons.name: magnezone
pokemons.description: As it zooms through the sky, this Pokémon seems to be receiving signals of unknown origin while transmitting signals of unknown purpose.

pokemons.name: lickilicky
pokemons.description: A contest is under way to determine which one can stick its tongue out the farthest. The current record is.. . more than 82 feet.

pokemons.name: rhyperior
pokemons.description: It can load up to three projectiles per arm into the holes in its hands. What launches out of those holes could be either rocks or Roggenrola.

pokemons.name: tangrowth
pokemons.description: It ensnares prey by extending arms made of vines. Losing arms to predators does not trouble it.

pokemons.name: electivire
pokemons.description: It grips its tail, which spews electricity, and then beats down opponents with the power of its electrified fist.

pokemons.name: magmortar
pokemons.description: There are still quite a few factories that rely on the flames provided by Magmortar to process metals.

pokemons.name: togekiss
pokemons.description: These Pokémon are never seen anywhere near conflict or turmoil. In recent times, they’ve hardly been seen at all.

pokemons.name: yanmega
pokemons.description: It prefers to battle by biting apart foes' headsinstantly while flying by at high speed.

pokemons.name: leafeon
pokemons.description: When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of sunshine, you’ll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.

pokemons.name: glaceon
pokemons.description: It can control its body temperature at will. This enables it to freeze the moisture in the atmosphere, creating flurries of diamond dust.

pokemons.name: gliscor
pokemons.description: It observes prey while hanging inverted frombranches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!

pokemons.name: mamoswine
pokemons.description: This Pokémon can be spotted in wall paintings from as far back as 10,000 years ago. For a while, it was thought to have gone extinct.

pokemons.name: porygon-z
pokemons.description: Its behavior is noticeably unstable, which is apparently due to the incompetence of the engineer who updated its programming.

pokemons.name: gallade
pokemons.description: When trying to protect someone, it extends its elbows as if they were swords and fights savagely.

pokemons.name: probopass
pokemons.description: Although it can control its units known as Mini-Noses, they sometimes get lost and don't come back.

pokemons.name: dusknoir
pokemons.description: At the bidding of transmissions from the spirit world, it steals people and Pokémon away. No one knows whether it has a will of its own.

pokemons.name: froslass
pokemons.description: When it finds humans or Pokémon it likes, it freezes them and takes them to its chilly den, where they become decorations.

pokemons.name: rotom
pokemons.description: Its electricity-like body can enter some kinds of machines and take control in order to make mischief.

pokemons.name: uxie
pokemons.description: Known as the Being of Knowledge, it is said that it can wipe out the memory of those who see its eyes.

pokemons.name: mesprit
pokemons.description: Known as the Being of Emotion, it taught humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.

pokemons.name: azelf
pokemons.description: Known as the Being of Willpower, it sleeps at the bottom of a lake to keep the world in balance.

pokemons.name: dialga
pokemons.description: A Pokémon spoken of in legend. It is said that timebegan moving when Dialga was born.

pokemons.name: palkia
pokemons.description: It is said to live in a gap in the spatial dimensionparallel to ours. It appears in mythology.

pokemons.name: heatran
pokemons.description: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with itscross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

pokemons.name: regigigas
pokemons.description: It is said to have made Pokémon that look likeitself from a special ice mountain, rocks, and magma.

pokemons.name: giratina-altered
pokemons.description: This Pokémon is said to live in a world on thereverse side of ours, where common knowledge isdistorted and strange.

pokemons.name: cresselia
pokemons.description: Shiny particles are released from its wings like aveil. It is said to represent the crescent moon.

pokemons.name: phione
pokemons.description: When the water warms, they inflate the flotation sacon their heads and drift languidly on the seain packs.

pokemons.name: manaphy
pokemons.description: It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bondwith any kind of Pokémon.

pokemons.name: darkrai
pokemons.description: It chases people and Pokémon from its territory bycausing them to experience deep, nightmarish slumbers.

pokemons.name: shaymin-land
pokemons.description: It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantlytransform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.

pokemons.name: arceus
pokemons.description: According to the legends of Sinnoh, this Pokémonemerged from an egg and shaped all there is inthis world.
